author: jfernan2
body:
#### PR description:

As suggested on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/32643 and after no response from TOP developers for months, we are safely removing EI from relVal steps

Announced on PPD core meeting 15/12/2021
Slide 13 of https://indico.cern.ch/event/1099504/contributions/4626290/attachments/2364681/4039466/21-12-15_News_PPDCoord.pdf
#### PR validation:

 runTheMatrix.py -l limite -i all --ibeos
title: Remove Event Interpretation (EI) from relval steps
